descriptions.1: The 1st Color, Survival, transfers into its distraction, Wanting.
descriptions.2: The 2nd Color, Possibility, transfers into its distraction, Probability.
descriptions.3: The 3rd Color, Power, transfers into its distraction, Personal.
descriptions.4: The 4th Color, Wanting, transfers into its distraction, Survival.
descriptions.5: The 5th Color, Probability, transfers into its distraction, Possibility.
descriptions.6: The 6th Color, Personal, transfers into its distraction, Power.
